formatting.title: AI Response Formatting
formatting.description: Text completion, such as instruc preset.

chatManagement.createPrompt: Enter a name for the new chat:
chatManagement.renamePrompt: Enter the new name for this chat:
chatManagement.deleteConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete the chat file "{chatFile}"? This action cannot be undone.
chatManagement.scenarioOverridePlaceholder: Override the scenario for this specific group chat...
chatManagement.deleteSelectedConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected chats?

group.autoModeHint: Automatically generate responses every X seconds. Set to 0 to disable.

description.label: Persona Description
description.placeholder:
Example:
[{'{{user}}'} is a 28-year-old Romanian cat girl.]

globalSettings.title: Global Settings
globalSettings.allowMultiConnections: Allow multiple persona connections per character
globalSettings.autoLock: Auto-lock a chosen persona to the chat

actions.syncName: Click to set user name for all messages

rename.title: Rename Persona
rename.prompt: Enter the new name for this persona:

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the persona "{name}"? All associated information will be lost.

worldInfo.activeWorldsHint: These lorebooks will be active in all chats unless overridden by character/chat-specific settings.
worldInfo.insertionStrategyHint: Determines the order in which lore from different sources is inserted into the context.
worldInfo.includeNamesHint: Include names with each message into the context for scanning
worldInfo.recursiveScanHint: Entries can activate other entries by mentioning their keywords
worldInfo.caseSensitiveHint: Lookup for the entry keys in the context will respect the case
worldInfo.matchWholeWordsHint: If the entry key consists of only one word, it would not be matched as part of other words
worldInfo.useGroupScoringHint: Only the entries with the most number of key matches will be selected for Inclusion Group filtering
worldInfo.alertOnOverflowHint: Alert if your world info is greater than the allocated budget.
worldInfo.selectEntryPlaceholderText: Select a lorebook entry or Global Settings from the list to begin editing.

entry.contentPlaceholder: What this keyword should mean to the AI...

popup.newBookContent: Enter the name for the new lorebook:
popup.deleteBookContent: Are you sure you want to delete the lorebook "{name}"?
popup.deleteEntryContent: Are you sure you want to delete the entry "{name}"?

backgrounds.autoSelectTooltip: Automatically select a background based on the chat context
backgrounds.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {fileName}?

errors.noChatLock: Select a chat to lock the background for it.

aiConfig.manualInputNote: Click slider numbers to input manually.

presets.deletePopupContent: Are you sure you want to delete the preset "{name}"?

errors.importInvalid: Failed to import preset. The file might be invalid.

promptManager.label: Prompt Manager
promptManager.description: Control how the final prompt is constructed before being sent to the AI.
promptManager.markerHint: This is a marker prompt. It serves as a placeholder for injected content and cannot be edited directly.

contextSize.label: Context Size (tokens)
contextSize.unlockedTooltip: Only enable this if your model supports context sizes greater than the slider's default maximum.

streaming.label: Streaming
streaming.description: Display the response bit by bit as it is generated. When this is off, responses will be displayed all at once when they are complete.

showThoughts.label: Request model reasoning
showThoughts.description: Allows the model to return its thinking process. This setting affects visibility only.

reasoningEffort.label: Reasoning Effort
reasoningEffort.tooltip:
Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models.
Reducing reasoning effort can result in faster responses and fewer tokens used on reasoning in a response.
reasoningEffort.descriptionOpenAI: OpenAI-style options: low, medium, high. Minimum and maximum are aliased to low and high. Auto does not send an effort level.
reasoningEffort.descriptionClaude: Allocates a portion of the response length for thinking (min: 1024 tokens, low: 10%, medium: 25%, high: 50%, max: 95%), but minimum 1024 tokens. Auto does not request thinking.
reasoningEffort.descriptionGoogle: Allocates a portion of the response length for thinking (Flash 2.5/Pro 2.5) (min: 0/128 tokens, low: 10%, medium: 25%, high: 50%, max: 24576/32768 tokens). Auto lets the model decide.

useSysPrompt.label: Use System Prompt
useSysPrompt.description: If enabled, the first system-role message will be used as Claude's system prompt.

assistantPrefill.label: Assistant Prefill
assistantPrefill.description: Text to pre-fill the assistant's response with. Usually `{'{{char}}'}:`

useSysPrompt.label: Use System Prompt
useSysPrompt.description: If enabled, the system prompt will be formatted in a way that is more compatible with Google models.

errors.csrfToken: Couldn't get CSRF token. Please refresh the page.

chat.inputPlaceholder: Type a message, or /? for help

generate.noPrompts: No prompts were built for the AI. Please check your prompt settings.
generate.errorFallback: Failed to get a response from the AI.
generate.noModelError: No model selected. Please check your API connection settings.
generate.noPersonaError: No persona selected. Please check your persona settings.
generate.noSpeaker: No valid speaker found for generation.

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
delete.confirmSwipeMessage: This is the last message. Do you want to delete just this swipe, or the entire message?

itemization.title: Prompt Itemization
itemization.disclaimer: Only the white numbers really matter. All numbers are estimates. Grey color items may not have been included in the context due to certain prompt format settings.

import.abortedMessage: Cannot import characters while generating. Stop the request and try again.
import.errorMessage: The file is likely invalid or corrupted.
import.tagImportAskNotImplemented: Tag import for "{characterName}" requires user input (not implemented yet).
import.tagImportExistingNotImplemented: "Import only existing tags" is not fully implemented yet.

save.noActive: Cannot save character: No active character or avatar found.
save.syncWarning: Character saved, but local list might be out of sync. Consider refreshing.

fetch.overflowWarning: Character data length limit reached. To resolve this, set "performance.lazyLoadCharacters" to "true" in config.yaml and restart the server.

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

character.tokenWarning: Character definition is large ({tokens} tokens), using over {percentage}% of your context window. This may impact performance and context limits.

characterPanel.pinToggle: Locked = Character Management panel will stay open

editor.placeholderText: Select a character from the list to view or edit their details.

characterEditor.avatar: Click to select a new avatar for this character
characterEditor.toggleSpoiler: Show / Hide Description and First Message
characterEditor.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your character's physical and mental traits here.
characterEditor.firstMessagePlaceholder: This will be the first message from the character that starts every chat.
characterEditor.openLastChat: Open last chat with this character
characterEditor.startNewChat: Start a new chat with this character

tokenCounts.title: Token counts may be inaccurate and provided just for reference.

moreOptions.setAsWelcomeAssistant: Set / Unset as Welcome Page Assistant

advanced.promptHint: Insert {'{{original}}'} into either box to include the respective default prompt.
advanced.mainPromptPlaceholder: Any contents here will replace the default Main Prompt.
advanced.postHistoryInstructionsPlaceholder: Any contents here will replace the default Post-History Instructions.
advanced.characterVersionPlaceholder: (If you want to track character versions)
advanced.creatorNotesPlaceholder: (Describe the bot, give use tips, etc.)
advanced.talkativenessHint: How often the character speaks in group chats!
advanced.dialogueExamplesHint: Important to set the character's writing style.
advanced.dialogueExamplesPlaceholder: (Examples of chat dialog. Begin each example with <START> on a new line.)

extensions.managePopupNotImplemented: Manage extensions popup not implemented yet.
extensions.installPopupNotImplemented: Install extension popup not implemented yet.

placeholder.title: Select an Extension
placeholder.text: Select an extension from the list on the left to view its details and settings.

profileManagement.create: Save current connection as new profile
profileManagement.deletePopupContent: Are you sure you want to delete the profile "{name}"?

errors.nameExists: A profile with this name already exists.

apiConnections.keyPrivacy: For privacy reasons, your API key will be hidden after you click 'Connect'.

spoilerFreeMode.label: Spoiler Free Mode
spoilerFreeMode.description: Hide character definitions from the editor panel behind a spoiler button.

neverResizeAvatars.label: Never resize avatars
neverResizeAvatars.description: Avoid cropping and resizing imported character images. Disables the upload cropping popup.

sendOnEnter.label: Enter to Send
sendOnEnter.description: Determines if the Enter key sends a message.

worldImportDialog.label: Lorebook Import Dialog
worldImportDialog.description: Ask to import World Info for new characters. If unchecked, a brief message will be shown instead.

confirmMessageDelete.label: Confirm Message Deletion
confirmMessageDelete.description: Show a confirmation dialog before deleting a chat message.

zoomedAvatarMagnification.label: Magnify Zoomed Avatars
zoomedAvatarMagnification.description: Enable magnification effect when hovering over a zoomed-in avatar.

tagImportSetting.label: Tag Import Behavior
tagImportSetting.description: How to handle tags when importing characters.

personaShowNotifications.label: Show Persona Notifications
personaShowNotifications.description: Display a notification when the active persona is switched.

personaAllowMultiConnections.label: Allow Multiple Persona Connections
personaAllowMultiConnections.description: Permit a single character to be connected to multiple personas.

personaAutoLock.label: Auto-lock Persona to Chat
personaAutoLock.description: Automatically lock a chosen persona to a chat when it's selected.

thumbnailColumns.label: Background Thumbnail Columns
thumbnailColumns.description: Number of columns for background thumbnails in the selector.

animation.label: Animated Backgrounds
animation.description: Enable animation for supported background formats (e.g., video, animated webp).

reasoningCollapsed.label: Collapse Reasoning by Default
reasoningCollapsed.description: If enabled, the reasoning (thinking) block on messages will be collapsed by default.

chatTranslation.connectionProfileHint: Select the API connection profile to use for generating translations.
chatTranslation.promptHint: Customize how the LLM translates text. Supports Handlebars variables: {'{{prompt}}'}, {'{{sourceLang}}'}, {'{{targetLang}}'}, {'{{name}}'}.

rerollContinue.divergenceError: Message content divergence detected. Aborting reroll.
rerollContinue.swipeError: Swipe changed. Cannot reroll previous swipe state.
